name: Garden Guardin' (imPACIOble)
description:
You are the Big ol Tree, Guardian of the forest. Plant fruits and veggies to fight of the incoming invaders, and see how far you can make it!

*note: don't worry that its a dev build. Running into issues with the actual unity export. 

A game made for Global Game Jam 2023. The theme was roots. 

Programming:
Jose Pacio
Jake Card
Jessica Card

 
Design:
Anthony Giovanetti

 
Sound Design:
Casey Yano

 
Art:
Marlowe Dobbe

 
Animation and Vfx: 
Chris Gortz  

Audio
Assets Peaceful Sound Loop is Hunters in the Forest by https://alkakrab.itch.io/free-medieval-soundtrack-no-copyright    Boss musics are by https://hypnosmna.itch.io/retrowave-music-pack
